start.name: Boss
start.text:
Greetings
! Welcome to Office Corp. I am your boss.

start.name: Boss
start.text: You have 7 weeks to show that you are useful.

start.name: Boss
start.text: You must complete all the tasks that you are given!

start.name: Boss
start.text: Enough chit chat. Now get to work!

start.name: TIP
start.text: Click on the home button to push the phone down and click on the phone again to bring it up

start.name: MOVEMENT
start.text: Use 'A' and 'D' keys to move left and right.

npc.name: Co-worker
npc.text: I see you are new here.

npc.name: Co-worker
npc.text: Now, don't walk around like that

npc.name: Co-worker
npc.text: ...we don't tolerate gloomy behavior around here!

npc.name: TIP
npc.text: The blue bar indicates your happiness level.

tv.name: Co-worker
tv.text: If you feel really sad just watch some TV

tv.name: TIP
tv.text: Staying next to the TV increases your happiness

tv.name: Co-worker
tv.text: but don't wait too long because time doesn't wait for anyone

tv.name: Co-worker
tv.text: The timer on the top right shows how much time you have left today

after-tv.name: Co-worker
after-tv.text: Tired already? We can't have you slacking off.

after-tv.name: Co-worker
after-tv.text: Grab a coffee to increase your energy.

coffee.name: TIP
coffee.text: Staying next to the Coffee maker increases your energy

coffee.name: TIP
coffee.text: The green bar indicates your energy level.

after-coffee.name: Co-worker
after-coffee.text: Now, you better get to work. Pull up the phone if you want to know what to do

Grab some paper and print the documents.name: Grab some paper and print the documents
TasksToDo: Find the paper on the 2nd floor
Find the printer and place the paper in it

after-Grab some paper and print the docu.name: Grab some paper and print the documents
TasksToDo: Well done, as the documents print, here's your next task

Bring it to the seventh floor

Now find fetch his chair

TasksToDo: Find the boss' chair
Give it to him

after-Find the boss's chair.name: Find the boss's chair
TasksToDo: Now that you've finally got used to the office
Get some clients

TasksToDo: Find a phone that's ringing
Pick it up

after-Answer the phone!.name: Answer the phone!
TasksToDo: Well done landing a new client
Your team needs to present a product to the boss

Find tools and Fix the projector.name: Find tools and Fix the projector
TasksToDo: Get the tools to fix the projector
Repair the projector on the 5th floor

after-Find tools and Fix the projector.name: Find tools and Fix the projector
TasksToDo: Well done fixing the projector
Organize the documents that you printed

Bring them to the printed documents

after-Your documents have been printed!.name: Your documents have been printed! Grab some staplers for your documents. Dont't worry, it wont hurt!

Get the documents to him to dethrone him

Become the boss
